title: Person of Interest- 5x11 - Shaw Interrogating
author: Amy
comment: Shaw is so good at getting answers. And she is hurting and angry that Root is dead. Sarah Shahi deserves an EMMY for her Shaw character!
Shaw is definitely hurting inside over Root.
That "I'm angry that you have people you can love and you chose to sign their death warrants" gets to me everytime
She's so heartbroken. Listen to the inflection of her voice in the next three episodes. It's very melancholy, and the spark is gone from her eyes.
That little spy in the making put it best. She isn't broken. Her emotions are like the sound of an old radio. they're there, but the volume's turned down
description:
